time_markers.text: For the period of JAM, for like three months
quotes: For the period of JAM, for like three months, the bank paid everybody. We negotiated that they would pay the Timorese a monthly allowance or stipend.

organizations.name: DPA
quotes: We only knew people [in the DPA] , but we didn’t really know the others.

organizations.name: World Bank
quotes: Meanwhile, the World Bank had taken on the JAM thing and we didn’t even know the connection between the JAM and the UNTAET.

organizations.name: UNTAET
quotes: Meanwhile, the World Bank had taken on the JAM thing and we didn’t even know the connection between the JAM and the UNTAET.

organizations.name: Trust Fund for East Timor (TFET)
quotes: How was this struggle over the Trust Fund for East Timor (TFET) resolved?

roles.title: development officer
quotes: I became Xanana’s development officer, the person to liaise with all the international community.
new Timorese, who had not the same capacity as the ones who were part of JAM and were part of the conference in Melbourne.
